name: VIR-272.02 Verify that the list of categories are shown as the check boxes within Categories section for the Business Unit permission

userStory.narrative:
As a Chief shopper, I require the ability to manage the categories
that each school will be able to view on the shop.virco site
so that I can control the consistency for the school.

title: VIR-272.02 Verify that the list of categories are shown as the check boxes within Categories section for the Business Unit permission
